about_the_game:
Loki is a legendary hack 'n slash RPG for the PC, brought to you by Focus Home Interactive and Cyanide Studio.

In this single-player demo, you will play as the Egyptian Sorcerer, one of the four characters available in the full game. As the powerful sorcerer you can invoke a vast array of fire-based spells that are particularly suited to fighting enemies at a distance. He is also a master of darkness-based spells which can annihilate enemies or inflict curses on them. You will start this demo with a Level 12 character and can develop along the numerous battles that await you. This allows you to get familiar with the numerous skills and powers available to the Egyptian Sorcerer.
